title: Rimma Martirosyan
author: Rimma Martirosyan
content: Hi everyone. I am a newcomer to this great platform, and I am excited to be a part of it. I am a part of a group of enthusiastic developers, and we aim to have our token in the growing world of crypto technologies. We are open to any challenge and creative ideas. If you have a new exciting project and need a team of experienced developers, we would be happy to collaborate or just know someone searching for one.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Is that mean if you are offering your service? if that was true and why don't you create your own service thread? that will be more attractive to the users. If you wanna create the new token and why don't you try to take a look some announcement thread as your reference and think about the unique ideas that would be very useful for the community. In here almost all of members are actually aware about how to know the different between scam or legit tokens. You can also make your own announcement thread as well. This is far better to searching for someone that interested to create a collaboration with you.

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Quote from: Rimma Martirosyan on August 05, 2022, 07:47:22 AMHi everyone. I am a newcomer to this great platform, and I am excited to be a part of it. I am a part of a group of enthusiastic developers, and we aim to have our token in the growing world of crypto technologies. We are open to any challenge and creative ideas. If you have a new exciting project and need a team of experienced developers, we would be happy to collaborate or just know someone searching for one. How would someone contact you since you are newbie? better to put social media accounts, proof of works(if there is any)  emails and at least any thing that will provide legitimacy from your team.you cannot lure costumers that will take your service if you will just post something like this here .Quote from: X-ray on August 06, 2022, 11:21:30 PMIs that mean if you are offering your service? if that was true and why don't you create your own service thread? that will be more attractive to the users. If you wanna create the new token and why don't you try to take a look some announcement thread as your reference and think about the unique ideas that would be very useful for the community. In here almost all of members are actually aware about how to know the different between scam or legit tokens. You can also make your own announcement thread as well. This is far better to searching for someone that interested to create a collaboration with you. Yes , and this thread attracts nothing in any sense .

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Well, since you're part of enthusiastic developers. I guess that you have ideas about the market already that are needing of people like you and you just have to find them out and ask them if they need your help.Go to the market places like in the Services and post the exact things you do. Don't just settle for the words "developers" without giving specification of your own fields.

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: Quote from: Rimma Martirosyan on August 05, 2022, 07:47:22 AMHi everyone. I am a newcomer to this great platform, and I am excited to be a part of it. I am a part of a group of enthusiastic developers, and we aim to have our token in the growing world of crypto technologies. We are open to any challenge and creative ideas. If you have a new exciting project and need a team of experienced developers, we would be happy to collaborate or just know someone searching for one. Looks like you are not truly interested in this forum or in anything , because you are just here to  try having a thread but never give any interesting idea or even place where to contact you.I think if you wanted to gain support and to be part of collaboration then you need to be active and bring your group here instead of asking us to be in yours.

comments.author: john1010
comments.body: I don't know if you are looking for someone or looking for something, it is not clear for what you want to offer or what you are needed. Well if you have an idea, you can share it with this section and definitely there's a brilliant mind here who are willing to help you. Or in other case, if you look some ideas there's a lot in here.

comments.author: Jeger.Kiting
comments.body: What can be expected of you and what can be shown to everyone here, if you are really part of the developer group, because you are not showing any link to connect with you. Since you are only speaking without giving the truth about yourself, will the people here believe it, with what you are saying, surely everyone will think this is just a joke you are talking about.
